post.description:
Create a single purchase order with one or many deliveries. Purchase orders must contain a valid billing address code, which will be mapped to a smartpaddle company before the engagement begins.

Purchase order requests must also contain a valid Bizongo supplier id which is one of Smartpaddle Technology Pvt. Ltd. (SPTPL) entities. Your account manager will share the correct entity code with you.

Billing address codes must exist on the system with a clear identifier that both systems agree and sync on.

billing_address.description: Billing address identifier (buyer_warehouse_code) of the address stored on Bizongo

order_id.description: String based order ID for each delivery, if this is blank, Bizongo will generate one

requested_delivery_date.description: Must be a string formatted in YYYY-MM-DD

mobile_number.description: Mobile number of the person at the delivery address for the courier to contact

gstin.description: GSTIN is required if this is a billing address

alias.description: Must give a unique identifier of address, if it is to be persisted at Bizongo

full_name.description: Name of the person at the delivery address for courier partner to contact

buyer_warehouse_code.description: Unique code for the delivery location, can be similar to alias

post.description:
Deliveries are created in a purchase order, if for all items of deliveries, the purchase order has any pending items and quantities in it.

If delivery requests contain the same item with requested delivery dates, but same location - and if the Bizongo system calculates that the expected delivery date is same for such requests, then we will auto-merge the deliveries.

Shipping address requires GSTIN
